activities.name: Debate Club
activities.description: Develop critical thinking and public speaking skills through competitive debates on current affairs and academic topics.

achievements.title: National Champions
achievements.description: Won the Kenya National Schools Debate Championship 2024

achievements.title: Regional Winners
achievements.description: Eastern Region debate champions for 3 consecutive years

activities.name: Drama & Theatre
activities.description: Express creativity through dramatic performances, script writing, and stagecraft.

achievements.title: Best Production Award
achievements.description: Outstanding performance at the Kenya Schools Drama Festival

activities.name: Football Team
activities.description: Build teamwork and physical fitness through competitive football at district and national levels.

achievements.title: District Champions
achievements.description: Won the District Secondary Schools Football Tournament

achievements.title: Regional Finalists
achievements.description: Reached the finals of the Regional Sports Championships

activities.name: Music & Choir
activities.description: Explore vocal and instrumental music, perform at school events and competitions.

achievements.title: Best Choir Award
achievements.description: Outstanding performance at the Music Festival of Kenya

activities.name: Science Club
activities.description: Conduct experiments, participate in science fairs, and explore STEM fields.

achievements.title: Science Fair Winners
achievements.description: First place in the County Science and Technology Exhibition

activities.name: Environmental Club
activities.description: Promote environmental awareness through tree planting, conservation projects, and sustainability initiatives.

achievements.title: Green School Award
achievements.description: Certified as an Eco-Friendly School by the Ministry of Environment

activities.name: Mathematics Club
activities.description: Enhance mathematical skills through competitions, problem-solving sessions, and mathematical exploration.

achievements.title: Mathematics Olympiad
achievements.description: Students qualified for the National Mathematics Olympiad

activities.name: Student Leadership Council
activities.description: Develop leadership skills through student government, event organization, and community service.

achievements.title: Outstanding Leadership
achievements.description: Recognized for exemplary student leadership and community service

events.title: Inter-House Sports Competition
events.description: Annual sports competition between all houses featuring athletics, football, volleyball, and traditional games.

events.title: Drama Festival
events.description: Showcase of student theatrical performances including plays, skits, and musical dramas.

events.title: Debate Tournament
events.description: Inter-class debate competition focusing on current affairs and social issues.

events.title: Music Concert
events.description: Annual music concert featuring choir performances, solo artists, and instrumental ensembles.

events.title: Science Exhibition
events.description: Student-led science projects and experiments showcasing innovation and creativity.

events.title: Environmental Awareness Day
events.description: Tree planting ceremony, waste management workshop, and environmental conservation activities.
